translation.en: [Sara] Girls today can be anything.
translation.ja: 現代の女の子は何にでもなれます

translation.en: CEO, Olympic golden medalist,
translation.ja: 現代の女の子は何にでもなれます ＣＥＯ 金メダリスト最高裁判所の判事にも

translation.en: even a Supreme Court Justice.
translation.ja: ＣＥＯ 金メダリスト最高裁判所の判事にも

translation.en: We've finally broken that glass ceiling and, wow, it sure looks good from the top.
translation.ja: ガラスの天井を突き破り上からの眺めを楽しめる時代

translation.en: -[giggles] Ah! -[Kenny] Stop!
Hey, go brush your teeth. Wipe her face.
Did you find your homework? And you, my little friend, you need pants.
translation.ja: 宿題はあった？ズボンはいて！

translation.en: Mom, can I stay home from school today?
translation.ja: ママ　今日 休んでいい？

translation.en: Nobody's staying home.
-I feel sick. -What hurts?
translation.ja: 具合が悪い どこが痛い？

translation.en: My spleen.
Specificity is good, but that's over the top. Next time, try tummy.
translation.ja: 具体的すぎてバツ次は“おなか”と

translation.en: It's go time. Let's go.
Okay, everyone's going to school. Mommy has something important to do.
translation.ja: 学校へ行ってママは大事な用がある

translation.en: [Amber] Oh, look.
[Kenny] Guys, look. Daddy's on TV again.
So what are you waiting for? A pig to fly?
translation.ja: 何を待ってるの？ 何を待ってるの？ 〝ボーランド･モーターズ 〞 〝ボーランド･モーターズ 〞 空飛ぶブタ？ 〝ボーランド･モーターズ 〞

translation.en: All right, let's go. Line up. Train's a-leavin'.
-Love you. Love you. -Bye.
-Bags in the back. -Love you.
Love you.
Love you.
Tuna fish. Keep it in the fridge. [sighs]
[Sadie] Stop, stop, stop. Mom.
translation.ja: ここで止めて　ママ

translation.en: [Annie] You make your dad drop you off all the way back here?
I don't know. [chuckles]
What's the girlfriend drive?
Porsche Turbo.
Oh! I'm so sorry. Did you need this?
translation.ja: ごめんね　これ必要だった？

translation.en: Love you, Sadie.
translation.ja: じゃあね　セイディ

translation.en: Can I have lunch money?
Ugh, come on. Did those kids take it again?
God, those douchebags. That was a 20.
translation.ja: まったく…20ドルあげたでしょ

translation.en: Well, small price to pay for the bone structure of my face.
translation.ja: 顔の骨格が無事なら安いでしょ

translation.en: That's very true.
I don't wanna leave you without cash.
Excuse me, who is the adult here?
Don't answer that.
So, why aren't there any of these awesome women in my history book, huh?
translation.ja: なぜ歴史の教科書に偉大な女性がいないのか

translation.en: I'll tell you why.
Sister made the mistake of getting her period.
translation.ja: 生理があるという間違いを犯したから

translation.en: They say, "Behind every great man, there's a great woman."
translation.ja: “偉大な男性の陰に偉大な女性あり”？

translation.en: Well, I say that's some bull right there.
Well, none of these nasty women I just told you about stood behind men.
translation.ja: 偉大な女性は男性の陰になんかいない

translation.en: -[pops lips] -They stood right beside them.
So, we gotta get it done ourselves, ladies. Am I right?
translation.ja: そんな風潮は終わらせましょう！

translation.en: You get it, girl! You get it!
translation.ja: そのとおりよ！よく言った

translation.en: -We're gonna burn this patriarchy down! -Whoo!
translation.ja: 家父長制度を焼き払いましょう！

translation.en: Ain't nobody gonna stop her?
[chuckles] Okay.
[Ruby] Okay, I'm out of here.
What's going on? You got an early shift?
I figured, you know, we could use the extra.
Mmm, I figured the same thing, 'cause I'm about to pull a double at the mall.
translation.ja: 俺もダブルシフトを考えてた

translation.en: I'll make it work.
-You always do, boo. -I do.
I cannot believe you.
Chill, sis. I'm, like, two minutes late.
translation.ja: 姉さん　２分 遅れただけ

translation.en: How was Sara's thing?
Oh, she was so good.
She's so smart. I worry about mine.
translation.ja: 頭がよくて うらやましい

translation.en: [chuckles] Stop it.
[sighs] All right, you all ready for this?
-[sighs] -Now or never.
[Ruby] Let's do it.
[Annie] All right! Everybody be cool, and nobody gets hurt!
translation.ja: おとなしくすれば誰も傷つけないわ

translation.en: Ladies and gentlemen, this is a robbery!
translation.ja: ご来店の皆さんこれは強盗よ

translation.en: -Oh, my lord! -[wax strip ripping]
Maybe we don't have to do the full Brazilian.
Oh, a Brazilian would put you in the hospital. This is just brush control.
translation.ja: 伸び放題だからこれからが本番

translation.en: Yeah, I probably don't get in here as much as I used to.
translation.ja: こういう場所 久しぶりだし

translation.en: [sarcastically] No.
My husband and I aren't having a lot of S-E-X right now.
translation.ja: 夫とも ご無沙汰だもの

translation.en: Maybe he just can't find it.
[sighs] Kids are back to school. I'm swamped. He's always working late.
translation.ja: 子育てでクタクタだし夫は残業続き

translation.en: Plus, there's so much on the DVR. It's really kind of hard to schedule--
translation.ja: 録画した番組も多すぎて時間がない

translation.en: Mrs. Boland? Your card was declined.
translation.ja: お客様カードが使えませんが…

translation.en: Are you sure?
I ran it twice.
I'm sure he just forgot to pay the bill. He's been very distracted lately.
translation.ja: 夫は最近 忙しくて支払いを忘れたのね

translation.en: Hey, there. Amber here, over at Boland Motors.
translation.ja: ボーランド･モーターズのアンバーよ

translation.en: We've got Chevys. We've got Fords. We've got Chryslers, too.
translation.ja: 〝デトロイトで一番のディーラー 〞 〝デトロイトで一番のディーラー 〞シボレーもフォードも 〝デトロイトで一番のディーラー 〞 クライスラーもあるわ

translation.en: Have we got the car for you?
Do you think I could make it in LA?
It's not like Michigan. They have really good actresses there.
translation.ja: ミシガンと違っていい女優は多い

translation.en: You're gonna win one of those fancy awards. Like a People's Choice.
translation.ja: “ピープルズ･チョイス･アワード”も君なら獲れる

translation.en: I don't need all that. I just wanna be super famous.
translation.ja: 要らないわ超有名になりたいだけ

translation.en: So, come on down to Boland Motors, where we'll put the vroom, vroom, vroom back in your engine.
translation.ja: ボーランド･モーターズでエンジン全開に！

translation.en: Annie Bananie. Hey, you, uh, you got any plans later?
translation.ja: かわいいアニーちゃんこの後 予定は？ 俺の教会が〝友達同伴ナイト 〞で

translation.en: My church is having a "bring a friend" night.
translation.ja: 俺の教会が〝友達同伴ナイト 〞で

translation.en: You know, I'm just not really much of a church person.
translation.ja: 教会へ行く趣味は特にないのよね

translation.en: You're definitely a stuck-up bitch.
I'm just kidding you.
Now, see, the old me totally would have meant that.
translation.ja: 昔の俺なら本気で言ったが

translation.en: But, uh, you know, born-again Boomer don't judge.
translation.ja: 昔の俺なら本気で言ったが 生まれ変わった

translation.en: This, uh, came from your register last night.
translation.ja: これが ゆうべ君のレジで見つかった

translation.en: Know what it is?
Mmm. This is a tough one. It's a curling iron?
translation.ja: 難しいわねヘアアイロン？

translation.en: We in the biz say "counterfeit."
translation.ja: この業界では〝偽札 〞と呼ぶ

translation.en: Now, see, I know it's counterfeit because I use the pen. Did you use the pen?
translation.ja: ペンを使えば見抜けるが使ったか？

translation.en: Boomer, I don't remember if--
I'm guessing you didn't, because if you had,
you would have known it's counterfeit. Which is why we have the pen.
translation.ja: 偽札だと分かったはずだ

translation.en: So, unfortunately, I'm gonna have to dock this from your paycheck.
translation.ja: 君の給料から天引きしとく

translation.en: Whoa, whoa. Wait. Boomer, that's, like, a whole shift for me.
Well, maybe next time you'll take security more seriously.
Oh, come on. What security?
Excuse me, how much longer is the wait? 'Cause we've been...
translation.ja: すみませんあと どれくらいで…

translation.en: [doctor] What I'm most concerned about right now is Stella's kidney function.
translation.ja: 気になるのはステラの腎機能だ

translation.en: Sara.
-What? -You said "Stella." Her name's Sara.
translation.ja: 何と？ 娘の名前は〝サラ 〞

translation.en: Okay, so, what about her kidneys?
[sighs] One is failing. The other one's right behind.
translation.ja: 片方は機能不全もう片方もギリギリ

translation.en: I would suggest that we put Sara
translation.ja: 片方は機能不全もう片方もギリギリ サラを移植待ちリストに⸺

translation.en: on a list for a transplant as soon as possible.
translation.ja: 載せることをお薦めしたい

translation.en: Carla, you just can't throw files like this.
translation.ja: カーラファイルを整頓してくれ

translation.en: [Carla] We just got ten walk-ins.
translation.ja: カーラファイルを整頓してくれ 調べてみたんです

translation.en: -I've been doing some reading. -Okay.
'Cause she can barely make it through the school day right now.
translation.ja: 今は一日学校にいるのも大変で

translation.en: [doctor] It's all willy-nilly over there.
-She can barely... -Okay? No. ...make it through the day, let alone soccer.
translation.ja: それからサッカーもできないし…

translation.en: You might wanna keep her home and get a tutor.
translation.ja: 自宅で勉強させるのは？

translation.en: Are those last week's blood draws?
Well, my husband and I work all the time...
-Here, Carla. -...so we can't. -And... -[doctor] Take them all away.
translation.ja: これもな全部 持っていってくれ

translation.en: And the transplant lists can take months, right?
translation.ja: 移植まで何カ月もかかる

translation.en: [doctor] Separate. Thank you.
-And there's this new drug... -[doctor] Thank you. -...that just got approved... -Take everything out.
translation.ja: 確か認可されたばかりの新薬が…

translation.en: Oh, my God! Can you please just listen to me for one damn minute?
translation.ja: ちょっと！少しは私の話を聞いて！

translation.en: Shame on you.
Shame on all of you. [crying]
translation.ja: あなたたち みんな…

translation.en: [sighs] Eculizumab.
That's the name of the drug you're talking about?
It improves renal function dramatically. It's also ten grand a month out of pocket.
translation.ja: 機能を劇的に改善する薬だが月に１万ドルかかる

translation.en: And I'm guessing that may not be an option.
translation.ja: 選択肢にならないのでは？

translation.en: Well, I'll talk to my husband. We might be able to swing it.
translation.ja: 夫と相談します払えるかもしれないし

translation.en: Okay.
[Beth] And she was only halfway through my wax.
So, what happened?
Well, now I'm very uneven.
-[Ruby] I don't even wanna know. -[chuckles]
Dean maxed out their credit card at some lingerie store.
translation.ja: 下着店で限度額いっぱいの買い物を

translation.en: Do you think he's sleeping around?
Don't nobody want Dean. It's a Christmas gift.
[Beth] In October?
Maybe it's your anniversary present.
He already gave me 100 coupons to Bed Bath & Beyond.
translation.ja: 雑貨店の割引券をもらった

translation.en: Ew. Really?
Son of a bitch.
No, I really do love it there.
No. That old guy is stealing your tip.
translation.ja: 老人があなたのチップを盗む

translation.en: He can't even walk.
-Go get it. -[Ruby sighs]
Shady SOB.
translation.ja: とんでもないクソジジイね

translation.en: -Huh? Mmm-hmm. -[Ruby] Shady.
At my old job, we got robbed all the time. So I got the sixth sense now.
translation.ja: 前の店は強盗が多くて勘が働くの

translation.en: Are you serious?
I mean, it's no big deal. All the stores I work at eventually get hit.
-You could get shot. -Ugh. One can hope.
translation.ja: 撃たれるかも そう願う

translation.en: These guys, they don't want to hurt anybody. They just want the money. So we let them have it. Nobody's trying to be a hero.
translation.ja: お金を渡せば乱暴しないから盗ませるの

translation.en: -Do they get caught? -[scoffs] Yeah, the dumb ones do,
translation.ja: 捕まるでしょ？ 防犯カメラの前に駐車するバカはね

translation.en: 'cause they park in the front by the security cameras.
translation.ja: 防犯カメラの前に駐車するバカはね

translation.en: You gotta put your getaway car in the back by the loading dock.
translation.ja: 裏に逃走用の車を隠さないと

translation.en: And you never dick around with the registers. The real money is back in the vault.
translation.ja: レジは時間のムダ大金は金庫にある

translation.en: You've really worked this out.
Just keeping my options open.
How much is in the vault?
Thirty grand, give or take.
Damn, I could use that money.
Oh, my God. Me, too.
So, when you wanna do this?
Well, I already bought three automatics and filed off the serial numbers.
translation.ja: 銃を３丁 買って製造番号は消した

translation.en: So, really, name a day.
translation.ja: あとは日を決めるだけ

translation.en: You should see your face.
It's whiter than usual.
[Annie] I'm gonna need you to all get on the ground.
Get your cell phones out of your pockets and keep your hands where I can see 'em.
translation.ja: 携帯を外に出して手は見える位置に

translation.en: All right, good. Now, I need you to get your manager up here.
translation.ja: それじゃあここに店長を連れてきて

translation.en: I said you need to get a manager up here right now.
translation.ja: 店長を呼べと言ってるの

translation.en: Hey, where's y'all's boss at?
I better get a manager up here right now or I will start capping people! I'm not even joking, mother--
translation.ja: さっさと店長を連れてこい！さもないと１人ずつ撃つよ！

translation.en: -You the manager? -Over there.
Hey. Hey, you. You.
-You, squirmy. Hey. Hey. Hey. -[grunting]
translation.ja: そこで もがいてる人

translation.en: Are you in charge here?
[stammering] Yes. Yes, I am.
[Beth] Okay, then, you listen to me. You're gonna put on your big boy panties,
translation.ja: よく聞いて客に伝えるのよ

translation.en: and you're gonna tell your customers to stay calm, and this will be over real soon.
translation.ja: すぐに終わるから静かにしてろって

translation.en: [Annie] Get out of there.
Everybody stay calm, okay?
translation.ja: 皆さん 落ち着いて

translation.en: Now, you're gonna take my friend here to the cash vault.
translation.ja: 私の友達を金庫へ案内して

translation.en: Move it before I shoot your face off! Let's go!
translation.ja: 早くしないと頭をぶち抜くよ！

translation.en: Now! Now! Now!
[sighs] Oh, my God.
[Ruby] Hey, Deadpool, you wanna...
Seriously?
You won't call me back.
I was busy.
So, here I am.
Well, I'm pretty sure I'm supposed to be helping customers, not chatting with my ex. So...
translation.ja: 別れた男とムダ話してないで接客しないと

translation.en: So, now I'm a customer.
Nancy and I are suing you for custody.
translation.ja: ナンシーと俺は君と親権を争うことにした

translation.en: Club card?
There's a hearing next month. You should probably get yourself a lawyer.
translation.ja: 調停は来月だから弁護士を雇え

translation.en: You know, if you sign up now, you get ten percent off your purchase.
translation.ja: 今 会員登録すれば10％オフに

translation.en: Annie, we were 17 when we decided all this stuff.
translation.ja: 17歳の時とは違う俺たちと暮らすほうが⸺

translation.en: Sadie would be happier with us now.
How do you figure, Greg?
We could send her to private school. St. Anne's.
translation.ja: セントアンズへ通わせる

translation.en: She's an atheist who enjoys a jaunty bow tie.
translation.ja: 男の子の格好が好きな無神論者よ

translation.en: I don't really think that Catholic school is a good fit.
translation.ja: 男の子の格好が好きな無神論者よ カトリックは無理

translation.en: We could get her therapy.
She doesn't need therapy. She's figuring out who she is.
translation.ja: あの子は自分を分かってる

translation.en: And that's all great, but she's getting bullied, Annie.
translation.ja: でも いじめられてるんだ

translation.en: Yes, by dickhead kids that need therapy.
translation.ja: セラピーが必要なクソガキにね

translation.en: Who's watching her now? I mean, it's after midnight.
translation.ja: 夜中だぞ　誰があの子を？

translation.en: The neighborhood girl. She's very good.
translation.ja: 近所の子よ　頼れるわ

translation.en: The one who got the DUI?
She lives within walking distance.
translation.ja: 今は徒歩圏内で生活を

translation.en: Buy her a new computer. Hers has been broken for a month.
translation.ja: パソコンを買ってやれ故障してる

translation.en: Why didn't she tell me that?
Because she said she didn't wanna freak you out.
translation.ja: 君が大騒ぎするからだとさ

translation.en: [Annie] Why is it so crazy?
translation.ja: 被害者のいない犯罪よ

translation.en: I mean, it's a victimless crime. The store is insured.
translation.ja: 店は保険をかけてるし

translation.en: Plus, you know they make us work through lunch? So it's basically tit for tat when you figure in the lost wages.
translation.ja: 昼休みに働かされた分をこれで取り返せる

translation.en: Oh, that will hold up in court.
Hey, no pop before dinner, sweetie.
translation.ja: 夕食前にソーダはダメ

translation.en: But she gets it.
That's because I am a grown-up.
Technically.
Okay. You know, can't you just have my back on, like, one thing ever?
translation.ja: １度くらい 私に賛成してよ

translation.en: This isn't me telling Mom and Dad that you smoked pot.
translation.ja: マリファナのこと親に言った恨み？

translation.en: -[kids laughing] -Which was incredibly lame, by the way.
This is me helping you not ruin your life.
translation.ja: 人生を棒に振ってほしくない

translation.en: Oh, because your life is so great. I should want this life?
translation.ja: 姉さんみたいな人生を送れと？

translation.en: I didn't say that.
You're, like, this Stepford mom without a pulse.
translation.ja: 貞淑な妻に憧れてると？

translation.en: I never said that.
You're cutting chicken fingers into stars. They're already fingers.
translation.ja: ムダに手をかけて料理してるだけ

translation.en: And I mean... not to pile on, but look who you married.
translation.ja: 追い打ちをかけて悪いけどあの旦那だよ

translation.en: It's 20 years and four children. Marriage sometimes takes a little work.
translation.ja: 結婚20年で４人の子持ちなら努力が必要なの

translation.en: That is so romantic.
You could lose your daughter. Has that occurred to you?
translation.ja: 娘を失うよりはマシでしょ

translation.en: Well, seeing as Greg is suing me for custody and I can't afford to fight it,
translation.ja: グレッグが親権を争うってさでも弁護士は雇えない

translation.en: yes, actually, the thought has crossed my mind.
translation.ja: だから言いたいことはよく分かる

translation.en: I didn't know.
Now you know.
Hey, there. Amber here, over at Boland Motors.
translation.ja: ボーランド･モーターズのアンバーよ

translation.en: Jeez. Who did this chick have to blow to get on TV? [scoffs]
translation.ja: 何をくわえた報酬でＣＭに？

translation.en: So what are you waiting for? A pig to fly?
translation.ja: 何を待ってるの？ 空飛ぶブタ？

translation.en: So come on down to Boland Motors,
translation.ja: ボーランド･モーターズで

translation.en: where we'll put the vroom, vroom, vroom back in your engine.
translation.ja: ボーランド･モーターズで エンジン全開に！

translation.en: Is your babysitter free?
Mmm. They took away her license. She's always home.
translation.ja: 免許を取り消されて暇なはず

translation.en: It's this charge here. Could you just tell me exactly what was bought?
translation.ja: この請求だけど何を買ったか教えて

translation.en: It's against policy to divulge information on previous purchases. For privacy concerns.
translation.ja: 購買記録を漏らすことは禁じられていますので

translation.en: Oh, but it's on her bill, so...
translation.ja: 彼女宛ての請求書なのよ

translation.en: Then she should remember what she bought.
translation.ja: だったら覚えてるのでは？

translation.en: Well, I remember that I bought it for a friend.
translation.ja: ある友達に買ったことは覚えてる

translation.en: And she loved it so much, she really went nuts for it.
translation.ja: すごく気に入ってくれた大喜びしてね

translation.en: But then, she was in an accident.
translation.ja: でも その後 事故に遭って

translation.en: With a driver. Texting.
translation.ja: 運転手がメールしてて

translation.en: It was the other driver texting, not my friend. She'd never do that.
translation.ja: ぶつかってきた相手がね

translation.en: But she's been in a coma ever since, and her brain is, like, ten times the size it should be.
translation.ja: 以来 ずっと昏睡状態なの脳は10倍に膨れ上がった

translation.en: Um... I just thought, "Wouldn't it be a nice gesture, if she wakes up..."
translation.ja: だから もし彼女が目覚めたら…

translation.en: -When she wakes up. Stay positive. -Yeah.
"...to have her favorite pair of undies waiting."
translation.ja: 大好きな下着を着せたい

translation.en: 'Cause she was wearing the last pair -when she got in the accident. -Mmm-hmm. Mmm-hmm.
translation.ja: 買った下着は事故の時に着てたの

translation.en: And the paramedics had to cut them off of her. You know, Jaws of Life style.
translation.ja: 搬送時に救命士がその下着を切り裂いたから…

translation.en: Darn it, if I cannot remember the size that I got...
translation.ja: サイズを忘れちゃって

translation.en: And I obviously feel stupid asking her family.
translation.ja: ご家族に聞くのは気まずいじゃない？

translation.en: -Mmm, can't do that. -So could you just look it up?
translation.ja: 無理 だから確認を

translation.en: Okay, just give me one second, please.
translation.ja: 少々 お待ちください

translation.en: Damn. That was a good sell.
This is so crazy. It'll be something for you.
translation.ja: 姉さんへのプレゼントよ

translation.en: Here it is. This was it?
Okay, yeah, that's probably not for you. [chuckles softly]
translation.ja: 明らかに姉さん用じゃないね

translation.en: [Annie] Okay. It's gonna be okay. We're gonna have a drink. Oof... We're gonna have ten drinks.
translation.ja: 憂さ晴らししようガンガン飲みまくるの

translation.en: Uh, hey, do you know the difference between a Manhattan and a sidecar?
translation.ja: マンハッタンとサイドカーの違いって？

translation.en: I always forget. Something about vermouth whispering--
translation.ja: マンハッタンとサイドカーの違いって？ カクテルって難しい

translation.en: Guess who found caramel bugles at Kroger?
translation.ja: キャラメル味のスナックを買った

translation.en: What is going on? The Bachelorette is on. Hello.
translation.ja: 「バチェロッテ」は始まってるよ

translation.en: [mouthing] Dean's having an affair.
What?
Dean is having an affair.
[mouthing] Dean is...
[normal] Son of a bitch.
Oh, honey. What can we do?
translation.ja: かわいそうにしてほしいことある？

translation.en: How about a screwdriver?
translation.ja: スクリュードライバーは？

translation.en: A sledgehammer.
What?
You planning on stopping this?
Nah. You?
Nah, I'm good.
What is it?
Oh, my God.
Does he have another ho?
[Beth] If you're looking for the vodka, I drank it.
translation.ja: ウォッカなら飲んだわ

translation.en: [Dean] What are you doing in the dark?
Guess I'm used to it after 20 years.
What does that mean?
It means your child bride wears very expensive underwear.
translation.ja: 若い愛人が高級下着を着ててもね

translation.en: What happened to us?
I was stupid.
I was stupid and...
It doesn't even matter.
Why do we have three mortgages that we haven't paid?
translation.ja: なぜ滞納してる抵当ローンが３カ所もあるの？

translation.en: Why do our credit cards all have advances on them
translation.ja: すべてのカードで借金してるうえに⸺

translation.en: and we have hardly anything in our accounts?
translation.ja: すべてのカードで借金してるうえに⸺ 口座の残高は ほぼゼロ

translation.en: Look, I made a few bad decisions at work.
Oh, my God.
I tried to fix it with a couple of investments, and I should have been...
translation.ja: 投資で挽回しようとした

translation.en: I should have been more careful. I panicked.
translation.ja: 軽率だったが焦ってて…

translation.en: We have four children.
I know.
Are we going to lose this house?
Look, I dropped the ball. That's all.
Are we going to lose the house?
translation.ja: だから家を手放すわけ？

translation.en: No!
I mean, I don't know.
Maybe.
We might.
We could lose everything.
[crying] I'm so sorry.
We're gonna rob that store.
What?
-We're gonna rob that store. -Yes!
translation.ja: 強盗するの やった！

translation.en: Have you lost your mind?
[Ruby] We were just kidding about the store, Beth.
translation.ja: 冗談だったのよ　ベス

translation.en: Hey, I wasn't.
-Well, I was. -Why? You need it just as bad as we do.
translation.ja: 私は違う あなたも お金が要る

translation.en: We just do it once. And we get some money.
translation.ja: １回だけよ　それでしのげる

translation.en: Oh, dear God.
[Beth] You can help your little girl.
You can take care of this custody thing.
translation.ja: あなたは親権を勝ち取り私は家族を守れる

translation.en: And I get to save my family. And we're done.
translation.ja: あなたは親権を勝ち取り私は家族を守れる 後にも先にも１度きり

translation.en: We never do it again,
and we don't sit back and let everything be taken away from us.
translation.ja: すべて奪われるのを黙って見てられない

translation.en: No one's gonna fix this. We have to do this ourselves.
translation.ja: 自分たちの手で乗り切るの

translation.en: [Ruby] What is taking so long?
[Beth] I don't know.
-[girl whimpers] -Hi.
How old are you?
Let me guess. Six?
Do you watch Doc McStuffins? [chuckles]
Uh, yeah, we, um, used to... watch it in the Big House.
translation.ja: 前に見てたんだ刑務所でやってたから

translation.en: -[Annie] Move it, you little weenie! -Ow!
Uh, I'm going as fast as I can.
Come on!
Get out of the way!
Stay right there!
[Ruby] Holy crap.
We gotta go. We gotta go! We gotta go!
-[Ruby] Let's go! -[Beth] Nope. Turn around!
-[Ruby] We gotta go! -[Annie] What?
[Beth] Go! Go! Go! Go, go, go!
Gotta go! We've gotta go.
There. Out there. They're going out the back!
Get them!
[Boomer] Get them! Get them!
[Ruby] Beth. Hello?
Are you okay in there? What's your name?
I robbed a grocery store.
[Ruby] Who's Secretary of State?
I robbed a grocery store.
translation.ja: スーパーに強盗へ入った

translation.en: Who is Secretary of State?
translation.ja: 国務長官 誰だっけ？

translation.en: We robbed a grocery store.
translation.ja: 私たち 強盗したのよ

translation.en: Oh, we totally did.
And we actually got away with it.
Like some smooth criminals.
translation.ja: 抜け目ない犯罪者みたい

translation.en: Uh, how much did we get? Tell me we got the 30.
translation.ja: いくらある？３万はあると言って

translation.en: We got it.
-[both sigh] -Thank you, God.
We got more than the 30 grand.
How much more?
What in the hell?
How is this even possible?
-Count it again. -I counted it right.
translation.ja: 数え直して 間違ってない

translation.en: Count it again!
You said there would be 30.
I said, "30, give or take." I guess it was give.
Why does a grocery store even have this kind of money on hand?
translation.ja: ただのスーパーに？ 怪しいお金なのよだから反対したの

translation.en: Because it's hella shady. I told you this was a bad idea.
translation.ja: 怪しいお金なのよだから反対したの

translation.en: You guys are missing the point. We just won half a million dollars!
translation.ja: 落ち着いて50万ドル 当てたんだよ

translation.en: -We didn't win anything. -Half a mil, bitches!
We didn't win it!
We stole it!
And maybe the cops don't follow up on $30,000.
They damn sure follow up on half a million dollars.
translation.ja: 50万なら話は別犯人探しに躍起になる

translation.en: What do we do?
Nothing.
We divide it up and we sit on it... until we can come up with a way to get rid of it quietly.
translation.ja: ３人で分けて保管してる間にこっそり手放す方法を考える

translation.en: Without looking like, you know...
-Criminals. -[Ruby] Yeah.
Okay?
Yeah.
Okay.
[clicks tongue] Okay.
What is this?
Turbo S. You know, it's similar to the model that douche-face Nancy has.
translation.ja: 二重人格のナンシーのと似た型だけど

translation.en: But more features, more cylinders. You know, more cooler.
translation.ja: もっと高性能で馬力もあってカッコいい

translation.en: Why don't you check under your seat?
Who are you? Oprah?
You get a laptop, and you get a laptop, and you get a laptop!
translation.ja: 新品のラップトップはあなたのものよ！

translation.en: I don't get it.
Uh, how to have fun? Yes, I can see that.
translation.ja: 楽しみ方が分からないのね

translation.en: No. How you have money for all this.
Would you just let me worry about that? -But-- -Who is the adult here?
translation.ja: 心配しないの大人はどっち？

translation.en: -Mom. -Who is the adult? Who's the adult?
translation.ja: ここにいる大人はママよ

translation.en: Come on, let's go tailgate some old people.
translation.ja: 他の車をあおりにいく？

translation.en: Hey, Mrs. Boland, nice weather we're having.
translation.ja: ボーランドさんいい天気ですね

translation.en: Afternoon, Mrs. Boland.
I'm gonna have to call you back.
Uh, Mrs. Boland, hi. What are you doing here?
translation.ja: 奥様　どういったご用で？

translation.en: I'm here to clean up a mess, Amber.
translation.ja: 後始末にね　アンバー

translation.en: What mess?
You. Sit.
Don't worry. I mostly blame him. He should know better. You're obviously stupid.
translation.ja: あなたの無知に付け込んだ夫が悪いのよ

translation.en: Oh, it's not a knock. We all have our strengths and weaknesses.
translation.ja: 非難じゃないわ人には短所はある

translation.en: You're a beautiful dummy. It doesn't make you a bad person.
translation.ja: あなたはバカな美人でも悪人じゃない

translation.en: So... here's what's going to happen.
translation.ja: だから こうしましょう

translation.en: You're going to quit your job and my husband, effective immediately.
translation.ja: 今すぐ仕事を辞めて夫との関係も解消するの

translation.en: Trust me, they're both a dead end.
This is five grand.
Enough for a plane ticket and a little to get you started in LA.
translation.ja: ＬＡで出直すには十分な額だと思う

translation.en: I do wanna warn you about something, though.
translation.ja: でも１つ 忠告するわね

translation.en: What's that?
Those folks out there, they take one look at a person like you...
translation.ja: あなたみたいにキレイでバカで⸺

translation.en: The pretty, the dumb, the self-hating,
translation.ja: 自己否定の強い女は簡単に引きずり込まれる

translation.en: and they figure... perfect for porn.
translation.ja: 自己否定の強い女は簡単に引きずり込まれる ポルノ業界に

translation.en: Mrs. Boland?
Why are you doing this?
Because we both deserve more than a liar in a pig suit.
translation.ja: ブタの格好をしたウソつき男には⸺

translation.en: Me more than you, but still.
translation.ja: もったいない 特に私は

translation.en: That's the nicest thing that anyone's ever said to me.
translation.ja: そんな誉め言葉 初めてです

translation.en: Really?
Uh, Mr. Boland?
Doctor, I know you're busy and I won't waste your time.
translation.ja: お忙しいところ恐縮です

translation.en: But I've been doing a lot of research here on different drugs and things.
translation.ja: いろいろな薬について調べてきたんです

translation.en: Oh, jeez. Um, it has this crazy-ass name.
translation.ja: 立派な名前が付いてますが

translation.en: Um, but I know it's all out of pocket.
translation.ja: どれも自費診療になるので…

translation.en: You're touching me.
Why are you touching me?
Because you've been here for ten minutes and you've barely taken a breath.
translation.ja: この10分間ろくに息をしてない

translation.en: The new med's a great option. Definitely worth trying before we go down the transplant road.
translation.ja: 移植に進む前に新薬は試す価値がある

translation.en: I've got samples. We'll start her on it and see how she does.
translation.ja: サンプルで様子を見ましょう

translation.en: In the meantime, let's do a CT, creatinine clearance and an ultrasound.
translation.ja: 並行してＣＴ撮影腎機能検査とエコー検査で

translation.en: Cover all bases.
Mom.
-Can we get some water in here, please? -[man] Yes, of course.
translation.ja: お水をお願い はい

translation.en: Oh, is cucumber-infused okay?
[crying] Oh, my God, yes.
-[chuckles] -Can I get lemon, too?
Annie Bananie.
translation.ja: かわいいアニーちゃん

translation.en: You forgot your paycheck. Lot of money in here. [chuckles]
translation.ja: 給料の小切手を忘れたよ

translation.en: Thanks.
Hey, how did you have the balls to do it?
translation.ja: よく あんな度胸があったな

translation.en: You and the girls get all get coked up or something beforehand?
translation.ja: ラリってて気が大きくなったか

translation.en: What?
I saw your ass tat.
I don't know what you're talking--
How many chicks have a tramp stamp that says, "All You Need Is Love"?
translation.ja: “愛こそはすべて”なんて誰が彫る？

translation.en: It's a very popular song.
translation.ja: 有名な曲だから人気なのよ

translation.en: Okay.
Well, then, uh, I guess you won't mind if I go to the cops then, right?
translation.ja: じゃあ 警察へ行っても構わないんだな

translation.en: If it wasn't you, I'm sure you got some explanation
translation.ja: 犯人じゃないなら説明できるだろ

translation.en: for how you bought all this on minimum wage.
translation.ja: 最低賃金でなぜ こんなに買えるのか

translation.en: [grunts] I didn't say nothing.
Cops came, but I didn't tell them.
translation.ja: 警察に聞かれたけどな

translation.en: What do you want? [shuddering] You want money?
translation.ja: 目的は何？お金が欲しいの？

translation.en: It's not like that.
What's it like, then?
I got your back. I'm gonna keep my mouth shut.
translation.ja: かばってやる 誰にも何も言わない

translation.en: Thanks.
I mean, I'm really gonna try.
translation.ja: できる限り努力はしようと思う

translation.en: I am. I hope I can. [inhales deeply]
translation.ja: できる限り努力はしようと思う 黙ってられるかな

translation.en: I don't know. I just get so lonely.
translation.ja: なんというか最近 人恋しくてね

translation.en: Well... [chuckles] I'm sorry to be crass here, but, uh...
translation.ja: ごめん不躾(ぶしつけ)かもしれないけど

translation.en: horny, too.
translation.ja: ムラムラする この軽い口を何とかしたいよどうしたって止まらない

translation.en: I just wanna shoot my mouth off. Talk and talk till I'm, um...
translation.ja: この軽い口を何とかしたいよどうしたって止まらない

translation.en: satisfied.
-Can we just get it over with? Okay? -Oh, but, hey, hey.
translation.ja: さっさと終わらせて 待てよ

translation.en: I'm not some "Wham! Bam! Thank you, ma'am."
translation.ja: 自分本位に勝手に済ませるタイプじゃない

translation.en: You know? I need a little romance.
translation.ja: 自分本位に勝手に済ませるタイプじゃない ムードを大事にする

translation.en: Mom?
Hi, honey. I thought you were asleep.
translation.ja: もう寝たかと思ってた

translation.en: And here it is. Found it.
translation.ja: ここにあった　見つけたよ

translation.en: He lost some change in the couch, so I was just helping him find it.
translation.ja: 彼が小銭を落としたから捜すの手伝ってたの

translation.en: -Thanks. -Yeah, no problem.
Oh, Sadie, honey, this is my, uh... Boomer.
translation.ja: セイディ　この人はブーマー

translation.en: I work with him at work. [chuckles]
translation.ja: ママとは お店の同僚よ

translation.en: You know, so... But he has to go now, because he was... He has to...
translation.ja: でも もう帰るって用事があるみたい

translation.en: I have to use the quarters on the vending machines.
translation.ja: 自動販売機用の小銭が必要だった

translation.en: I was going to maybe fill a meter or two, to surprise someone.
translation.ja: 誰かの駐車メーターにも入れてやろう

translation.en: -Hey, that's nice. -Yeah. Pay it forward or whatever.
translation.ja: それは親切ね 慈善活動かな

translation.en: Just go.
[Boomer] You know, uh...
since I have all this bus fare now,
translation.ja: バス料金も手に入ったことだし

translation.en: I'll probably be back soon.
Good morning.
I'm gonna need the PINs and passcodes to the accounts.
translation.ja: すべての口座の番号とパスワードを

translation.en: Mortgage, bank, credit cards.
translation.ja: 住宅ローン 銀行クレジットカードも

translation.en: Uh, it's 2 Fast 2 Furious.
It's the number two, like the movie.
I know it's a movie.
That's for all of them?
Yeah.
I handled the mortgage.
[stutters] How did you do that?
I handled it because you couldn't.
translation.ja: あなたが払えないから

translation.en: And this thing that we do...
where you bring home the bacon and I don't ask any questions? That's over.
translation.ja: あなたが稼いで私は従順な妻ってのは終わり

translation.en: Does that mean we get to stay in the house?
It means I get to stay in the house with the kids.
translation.ja: 私と子供たちは住める

translation.en: You get to go to a motel.
Your clothes are in the car.
Still no leads on last week's armed robbery of Fine & Frugal.  A rep from the local...
translation.ja: 先週のスーパー強盗は今も手がかりはなし

translation.en: You don't think it's weird?
What?
Our GoFundMe page has been up for years. Some anonymous donor rolls in now with all that cash?
translation.ja: 突然 俺たちに匿名の寄付が届いた

translation.en: [Ruby] It's a miracle.
Why question it?
See this?
I do.
Our girl's coming back.
[chuckles] Hey... Okay, bruiser. All right, ease up on 'em. You got him.
translation.ja: 乱暴者めもう弟を勘弁してやれ

translation.en: -[Sara grunts] -[Stan] Look at you.
Hey, buddy. What's wrong?
You need to go potty? You need to peepee?
translation.ja: 外でオシッコしたいの？

translation.en: Nah, he's good.
We already took him out.
What do you want?
Oh, relax, sweetheart.
I just need you to call your lady friends over
translation.ja: あんたのお友達をここへ呼んで⸺

translation.en: so we can all have... a little talk.
translation.ja: あんたのお友達をここへ呼んで⸺ おしゃべりしよう

translation.en: About what?
Oh, about the money you stole from us.
translation.ja: 俺たちから盗んだ金のこと

translation.en: Yo, this backsplash is dope.
translation.ja: この汚れ止め板 最高だな

translation.en: Hey, what's it made out of? Marble?
Yo, you ever get any problems with staining back here? Like, if you're cooking a big pot of spaghetti sauce or something like that?
translation.ja: パスタソースとか飛び散ったら どうなる？

translation.en: No, I don't think so.
No? [chuckles]
We didn't know you owned the store.
I look like some kind of grocery store manager to you?
translation.ja: スーパーの経営者に見えるか？

translation.en: Or, like, Rotary club or something?
translation.ja: ボランティア団体とか

translation.en: No, let's just say that we got certain arrangements with some local businesses.
translation.ja: 地元の企業と特別な契約をしてるんだ

translation.en: And we help each other out and whatnot. You know?
translation.ja: お互いに助け合ってる

translation.en: Like... money laundering for drugs? I told you it was shady.
translation.ja: 麻薬取引の資金洗浄とか？ だから怪しいと

translation.en: Why don't you stop worrying about my business dealings and start figuring how you're gonna pay me my money back.
translation.ja: 俺の事業の心配はいいどうやって金を返す？

translation.en: -We can get it back. -Oh, that would be great.
translation.ja: 返すわ それはよかった

translation.en: Most of it.
Sorry, what?
[Annie stammers] Some of it, for sure.
[sighs] Oh, what, like you guys didn't spend a dime?
translation.ja: 少しも使わなかったの？

translation.en: How much, Annie?
I don't know. I probably spent, like, a hundred... grand.
translation.ja: 分からない　少しよ 10万ドル

translation.en: [both] What?
I'm gonna shoot you myself.
Nah, you're just gonna pay me back is all.
translation.ja: 全額 耳をそろえて返すんだ

translation.en: I mean, right quick, too. With interest.
translation.ja: すぐにな　利息分も入れて

translation.en: So, we'll see you real soon, yeah?
translation.ja: では近いうちに また会おう

translation.en: You've really got to be careful, ladies.
I mean, with citrus on marble, like lemon and whatnot.
translation.ja: レモンとかの柑橘系の果汁で

translation.en: That stuff will erode like crazy.
[Kenny] Why can't Daddy come home?
Your daddy and I love you so much. And I know it's confusing.
translation.ja: 混乱するかもしれないけど パパとママは大人の問題を解決してるの

translation.en: Daddy's gotta stay here while he and I work on some grown-up stuff.
translation.ja: パパとママは大人の問題を解決してるの

translation.en: You can have whatever candy you want -from the vending machines, okay? -[kids] Yay!
translation.ja: お菓子は何を食べてもいい

translation.en: -Hey. -Pick the kids up from school and bring them straight back here. Don't go to the park or anywhere.
translation.ja: 学校から寄り道しないでここへ戻ってね

translation.en: I can't have the kids here. I've got, like, one twin bed.
You just have to.
What's going on?
I can't tell you.
Wait. Uh, stop. Are you okay?
Just take care of my babies.
Hey, who wants, uh... Who wants pizza?
-[Kenny] I do! -[kids cheer]
I would have picked you up down the block, but your cell was off.
[Sadie] Where's the Porsche?
I sold it. I had to.
translation.ja: 売ったの　仕方なくて

translation.en: Is that a cassette deck?
What?
And manual roll-down windows?
Yas, Queen.
Mmm-hmm. Cloth interior. Nice. Leather burns your ass.
translation.ja: シートは布だよレザーは気持ち悪い

translation.en: How did you get to be so awesome?
translation.ja: なんて いい子なの

translation.en: Don't ride in Porsches.
[Ruby] Who is it?
I said, who is it?
-[Stan] Me. -[sighs]
Stan.
[laughs] What the hell are you doing?
I want an alarm system. And can you please fix the back gate?
translation.ja: 警報装置が欲しい裏門も直してよ

translation.en: I said I would. -Yeah. -Okay.
You said it, but it just sits there, wide open.
translation.ja: 口ばっかりで 壊れたままよ

translation.en: Got your bat out. You could've gotten the knife out of the drawer, baby.
translation.ja: バットなんて包丁のほうがいいぞ

translation.en: All right. I'm sorry. -I'm sorry. Calm down. I'm sorry. -[groans] God.
translation.ja: 悪かったよ　落ち着いて

translation.en: You scared? Your heart's beating. Come here. Breathe. Breathe.
translation.ja: 怖かった？ おいで　深呼吸して

translation.en: What did I tell you?
All this right here is all the security you need, baby.
translation.ja: セキュリティーが必要なのはこの中だけ

translation.en: -You don't need no Wiffle bat. -Hmm. Is that so?
translation.ja: 武器は要らない そう？

translation.en: Yeah, that's so, because your man here, you know...
translation.ja: どうしてかって言うと君の夫は…

translation.en: is no longer gonna be trailing teenagers at the Great Steak & Fry.
translation.ja: レストランの仕事とおさらばする

translation.en: -You applied to the police academy? -I did.
translation.ja: 警察学校に？ 不合格だったらと君には黙ってた

translation.en: Yeah. I didn't tell you in case I got rejected.
translation.ja: 不合格だったらと君には黙ってた

translation.en: Brother ain't get rejected.
Oh. Detroit's finest, baby. Protect and serve.
translation.ja: デトロイトの警官になる

translation.en: Give me some.
-[Beth] Where are we at? -[Ruby] Short.
[Beth] By how much?
[Ruby] Over sixty grand.
-[sighs] -What about the car?
I took it back. Lost over half its value, B-T-dubs.
translation.ja: 売ったけど価値が半分になった

translation.en: Well, maybe you shouldn't have bought it in the first place.
My, what a helpful contribution. Let me just grab my time machine.
translation.ja: タイムマシンで戻れって？

translation.en: Oh, my God. We should just go to the police.
[Annie] Wait. What?
[Ruby] We haven't done anything that bad yet. We don't have records.
translation.ja: そこまで悪さはしてない前科もないし

translation.en: [Annie] Uh, yes. Now we do.
[Ruby] If we just explain to them that--
Explain what, that we meant well?
Gee, Officer, we're sorry. We didn't mean to piss off the gang.
translation.ja: “ギャングを怒らせるつもりはなかった”と？

translation.en: -We just wanted to rob the grocery store. -Okay, I'm just trying not to die, okay?
translation.ja: “ギャングを怒らせるつもりはなかった”と？ 死にたくないだけよ他に方法はある？

translation.en: -If you have a better plan-- -Actually, yes, I do.
translation.ja: 死にたくないだけよ他に方法はある？ あるわ　他の店から盗むのよ

translation.en: We should take it from somewhere else.
translation.ja: あるわ　他の店から盗むのよ

translation.en: We'll just steal it and then we'll pay them back and then we'll just put the whole thing to bed.
translation.ja: そのお金で返して一件落着よ

translation.en: Bitch, are you out of your mind?
translation.ja: あなた イカれちゃった？

translation.en: -It's the best possible plan! -[Beth] Enough!
Enough!
Enough.
We're gonna get that money. We're gonna figure it out.
translation.ja: お金を集める方法を考える

translation.en: Because we are strong and resourceful.
translation.ja: 私たちは強くて才覚がある

translation.en: And we've accomplished way harder than this.
translation.ja: もっと難しいことも成し遂げた

translation.en: I once made 300 cupcakes in one night,
translation.ja: １晩でカップケーキ300個を作った

translation.en: and they were nut and gluten-free.
The kid still had an allergy attack.
And you don't always have to fact-check me, okay?
I'm gonna take a shower.
I smell like booze and crime.
translation.ja: お酒と犯罪の臭いがする

translation.en: [Ruby] Call you tomorrow.
-[sighs] Boomer, I, uh... -Oh? Bad time?
translation.ja: ブーマー　今は… 都合が悪い？

translation.en: Very.
Hey, come on. Don't be rude.
Oh, God. Boomer, you're wasted.
You know, I was just thinking about how we didn't finish what we started.
translation.ja: やり始めたことが終わってなかったからな

translation.en: -Boomer, it's not... Stop. Stop. -[chuckles] What?
translation.ja: ブーマー　やめて 何だ？

translation.en: Why don't we just have a little bit of fun?
translation.ja: ちょっと楽しむだけだ

translation.en: Boomer, hey, hey. Stop.
translation.ja: ちょっと楽しむだけだ やめてよ

translation.en: My sister is here.
[pants] Yeah? Is she hot?
I'll be fast, I promise.
-Did you just hit me? -[panting]
[grunts] Stop! No!
You're hurting me!
That's how you like it, right, tough girl? Come on. You can rob a store, right?
translation.ja: 好きだろ強盗するくらいタフだし

translation.en: Get off of her!
-Whoa! Hey, hey, hey. Hey, easy. -[crying]
All right, no need to get upset.
All right? No need to get upset.
Oh, do I look upset? Why would I be upset?
Because every man in the world thinks he can do whatever he wants whenever he wants?
translation.ja: 世の男は何をしてもいいと思ってるから？

translation.en: Okay, okay. Hey, we were just having a little bit of fun. All right?
Oh, was that what that was? Because you see...
when a lady screams "stop,"
translation.ja: 女が“やめて”と叫んだら

translation.en: it is usually because she is not having the time of her life.
translation.ja: 楽しんでないっていう意味よ

translation.en: But what do I know?
Now, you're gonna pull up your pants
and you are gonna get the hell out of here.
translation.ja: さっさと ここから出ていって

translation.en: Get out!
Is that a...
toy gun?
No.
[sighs] Yeah, it is.
No, it's not.
Okay, then...
shoot me, hmm?
You stupid bitches.
You're going down.
Boomer! Boomer! Please! You need money? We'll get you money.
translation.ja: お願いよ　お金ならあげる

translation.en: -Oh, no, I'm turning you in. -Boomer, please. Please.
translation.ja: 通報する お願い　やめて

translation.en: You know how fast they're gonna lock you up
translation.ja: すぐに拘束されて子供を取り上げられる

translation.en: -and take away your loser kid? -No, Boomer. Please.
translation.ja: すぐに拘束されて子供を取り上げられる マヌケな姉貴もだ２人ともムショで朽ち果てろ

translation.en: Yeah, your dumbass sister, too. The two of you are so done. You're gonna rot in jail.
translation.ja: マヌケな姉貴もだ２人ともムショで朽ち果てろ

translation.en: Yeah, you think you're so much better than everyone.
translation.ja: 自分たちは利口だとでも思ったか

translation.en: Well, now you are finished. It is over.
translation.ja: お前らは おしまいだ

translation.en: -Oh, my God! -[groans]
You...
Is he...
He's not.
No.
Are you sure?
No.
[sighs] What do we do now?
We're not going to the police.
